abstract: Baseball caps have become a statement all over the world, which is why seeing a Yankees cap on a Libyan youth in the crowd when Col Muammar El-Qaddafi was killed was not all that shocking.
snippet: Baseball caps have become a statement all over the world, which is why seeing a Yankees cap on a Libyan youth in the crowd when Col Muammar El-Qaddafi was killed was not all that shocking.

headline.main: Yankees Caps Appear in Odd Places, Including Libya
